    class Solargraph::Pin::YardPin::Namespace

    Public Class Methods

    new(code_object, spec) click to toggle source
    Calls superclass method Solargraph::Pin::Namespace.new 
    # File lib/solargraph/pin/yard_pin/namespace.rb, line 8
def initialize code_object, spec
  @code_object = code_object
  @spec = spec
  closure = Solargraph::Pin::Namespace.new(
    name: code_object.namespace.to_s,
    closure: Pin::ROOT_PIN,
    gates: [code_object.namespace.to_s]
  )
  super(
    location: location,
    name: code_object.name.to_s,
    comments: nil,
    type: namespace_type,
    visibility: code_object.visibility,
    closure: closure
  )
end

    Private Instance Methods

    namespace_type() click to toggle source 
    # File lib/solargraph/pin/yard_pin/namespace.rb, line 28
def namespace_type
  code_object.is_a?(YARD::CodeObjects::ClassObject) ? :class : :module
end
